dcterms:creator: Angel X. Chang
Thomas Funkhouser
Leonidas J. Guibas
dcterms:description: ShapeNet is a large scale organized collection of richly-annotated 3D CAD models. The dataset provides 3D volumetric objects in 13 classes, but only a subset was used that appears in the following real world image datasets.
dcterms:title: ShapeNet

dcterms:creator: Yu Xiang
Roozbeh Mottaghi
Abhinav Gupta
dcterms:description: PASCAL 3D dataset augmented 3D CAD models on PASCAL 2012 detection images. A subset containing 3000 models covering 4 categories was chosen, with 2D images being real world images with complex backgrounds.
dcterms:title: PASCAL 3D

dcterms:creator: Bo Li
Yijuan Lu
Godil
dcterms:description: The SHREC 13 dataset includes 20000 human-drawn sketches, categorized into 250 classes, with 80 sketches per class. The dataset is used for sketch-based 3D shape retrieval.
dcterms:title: SHREC 13
